message: Let's start with this. A 70/30 split seems fair to me considering the inflation and the fact that you will be at a disadvantage in the later rounds.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but the split needs to be a bit more in my favor due to the inflation. How about a 60/40 split?
Bob, I understand the inflation puts you at a disadvantage, but your previous offer wasn't reasonable given the circumstances. Let's meet in the middle - 65/35.
